alert.note: Alert for Dent (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 9:12PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Shannon and southeastern Dent Counties through 945 PM CST... At 912 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Bunker, or 16 miles southeast of Salem, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Echo Bluff State Park... Current River State Park... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Bunker... Turtle... Midridge... Round Spring... Akers... Gladden... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for south central Missouri.
